channel.title: AmzinaiScape 2006 Old School Server Development Team Required
channel.description:
[size=22pt]AmzinaiScape - An Old School Server[/size]
Server Features:
[spoiler]...
[center] [size=22pt]AmzinaiScape - An Old School Server[/size]
[size=18pt]LINKS[/size]
REMOVED
[size=18pt]Features
28x experience meaning 112xp per hit!
Stable dedicated host offering 99.99% up time
Pest Control 100%
Fight Pits 100%
Castle Wars 100%
Fight Caves 100%
Warrior Guild 100%[/center]
[center][size=18pt]20 Fully working skills[/size]
[size=18pt]Working Dwarf Mini Cannon
Over 10 fully working quests[/size]
[center][size=18pt]Screen Shots[/size] [/center]
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/42ee85b7_o.bmp[/img]
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/a5a9b600_o.bmp[/img]
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/aabc1d17_o.bmp[/img]
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/835e8813_o.bmp[/img]
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/6fbd7ce1_o.bmp[/img]
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/f09318d9_o.bmp[/img]
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/faddc287_o.bmp[/img]
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/fc5fc3b3_o.bmp[/img]
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/6a12ae74_o.bmp[/img][/center][/spoiler]
The server is currently online, advertise on other forum under sponsor and hopefully on moparscape sponsor next month.
Development team Requirements
[u][b]Forum Moderator / Advertiser / website creator[/b][/u] Adding News and updates to the website, Posting and moderating the forums and advertising the server.
[u][b]Requirements[/b][/u] -Smart individual -professional -trust worthy -Plenty of ideas -enthusiasm
[u][b]Server Developer[/b][/u] Adding new events to the server, adding simple npc drops, adding shops, adding npc dialogues, general java coding.
[u][b]Requirements[/b][/u] -Detailed knowledge of java coding -professional -trust worthy -Plenty of ideas -enthusiasm
Please note All staff members will be Administrator's online. Any successful applicants will be under a month trial as a moderator then upgraded to administrator. If you would like to apply for a position please answer these main questions
1) Role Applied For. 2) Full Name. 3) Can you speak and write English, any other language please list. 4) What makes you think I should hire you? 5) hobbies and random facts about yourself.
Please post your application below or message me!
Thanks James.

item.title: AmzinaiScape 2006 Old School Server Development Team Required
item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

  1. Server Developer
  2. Tristan
  3. Can you speak and write English? yes
  4. What makes you think I should hire you? I’m a hard worker and I have nothing but time.
  5. hobbies and random facts about yourself. I like computers, games, and driving

Read full topic

item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Good luck finding a good shard developer who is willing to work for you.

item.title: AmzinaiScape 2006 Old School Server Development Team Required
item.dc:creator: @Kingclawz Kingclawz
item.description:
@Kingclawz wrote:

  1. Server Developer
  2. Adam Drew Rezewski
  3. I can speak and write English. I can only speak a tiny bit of Arabic but can’t type it.
  4. Well I meet all your qualifications the only thing I’m a bit shaky on is adding in new dialogues. But I am learning. I think I’d be fine for the job.
  5. Well I play in a high level of futbol aka soccer. I like to hang out with friends. I’m in grade 10 and I live in Canada. I like to RipStik. I’m a pretty athletic person. I love track and field.

Read full topic

item.description:
@amzinaiscape wrote:

[size=22pt]AmzinaiScape - An Old School Server[/size]

Server Features:

[spoiler]…

[center]
[size=22pt]AmzinaiScape - An Old School Server[/size]

[size=18pt]LINKS[/size]

REMOVED

[size=18pt]Features

28x experience meaning 112xp per hit!

Stable dedicated host offering 99.99% up time

Pest Control 100%

Fight Pits 100%

Castle Wars 100%

Fight Caves 100%

Warrior Guild 100%[/center]

[center][size=18pt]20 Fully working skills[/size]

[size=18pt]Working Dwarf Mini Cannon

Over 10 fully working quests[/size]

[/center]

[/center][/spoiler]

The server is currently online, advertise on other forum under sponsor and hopefully on moparscape sponsor next month.

Development team Requirements

Forum Moderator / Advertiser / website creator
Adding News and updates to the website, Posting and moderating the forums and advertising the server.

Requirements
-Smart individual
-professional
-trust worthy
-Plenty of ideas
-enthusiasm

Server Developer
Adding new events to the server, adding simple npc drops, adding shops, adding npc dialogues, general java coding.

Requirements
-Detailed knowledge of java coding
-professional
-trust worthy
-Plenty of ideas
-enthusiasm

Please note All staff members will be Administrator’s online. Any successful applicants will be under a month trial as a moderator then upgraded to administrator. If you would like to apply for a position please answer these main questions

  1. Role Applied For.
  2. Full Name.
  3. Can you speak and write English, any other language please list.
  4. What makes you think I should hire you?
  5. hobbies and random facts about yourself.

Please post your application below or message me!

Thanks James.
